casebody.data:
Anthony ALLEN
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 6, 2016

James P. Sexton, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Denise B. Smoker, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Anthony Allen's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 167 Conn.App. 868, 143 A.3d 1217 (2016), is denied.

ROBINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
